feature1.description: Generate AI dialogues calibrated to your proficiency level. Create rich, contextual input that's challenging yet understandable—the sweet spot for acquisition.

feature2.title: Narrow Listening
feature2.description: Build fluency through repetition with variation. Experience the same story told multiple ways—different tenses, formality levels, and perspectives—to deeply internalize patterns.

feature3.description: Acquire grammar through structured input activities. Learn lexical chunks as complete units, the way native speakers actually use language—not isolated words or abstract rules.
